text: == Events == * March War of Independence of Western Xia occurred. * June 17 – Harthacanute lands at Sandwich and reclaims the English Throne. * August 15 – King Duncan I is killed in battle against his first cousin and rival Macbeth. The latter succeeds him as Scottish Monarch. * The oldest brewery still active is founded at Weihenstephan. * Seljuk Turks defeat the Ghaznavids at the Battle of Dandanaqan. == Births == * February 22 – Rashi, French rabbi and commentator (d. 1105) * June 27 – King Ladislaus I of Hungary (d. 1095) * King Alfonso VI of Castile, Spanish royal (died 1109) == Deaths == * March 17 – Harold Harefoot, King of England * August 15 – King Duncan I of Scotland (b. 1001) * October 1 – Alan III, Duke of Brittany (poisoned) (b. 997) == Related pages == * For the U.S. Internal Revenue Service (IRS) form, see Form 1040.
